headline: Ad Agencies’ Low Growth Will Drag On as They Adjust to Era of AI, Barclays Says
summary: The firm downgraded three advertising giants after recent meetings, while other analysts said artificial intelligence could increase demand for ad services eventually.

raw.headline: Ad Agencies’ Low Growth Will Drag On as They Adjust to Era of AI, Barclays Says
raw.summary: The firm downgraded three advertising giants after recent meetings, while other analysts said artificial intelligence could increase demand for ad services eventually.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid OMC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Omnicom Group’s stock price fell to $71.36. Shareholders have lost 16.8% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 4.5%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
